text: Hanki Hezekaiaga kagritera amanahu avame'za fore hugahie. Meni kafufina agra'ama hageno marerisnia witireti erita neneta, anaga'a kafufina ana witifinti'ma taniramino hageno rentesnia witireti erita negahaze. Hianagi nampa 3 kafurera tamagra'a hoza erita anteta neneta, waini hozanena nenteta raga'a tagita negahaze.
